Chic and warm, the Ekta is a Boutique Hotel 3 star Deluxe, unique and unusual, in a legendary district, close to the Avenue George V and the Lido, near to Avenue Montaigne, the Grand Palais and the Petit Palais and the shops of major French brands like Louis Vuitton, Cartier, Laduree ... Perfect for a romantic weekend, a business trip or an original stay, the hotel Ekta has 25 rooms including 5 suites, comfortable and trendy design. Decoration in homage to fashion, warm and efficient welcome: Ekta hotel makes you live an exceptional journey in Paris between the Arc de Triomphe and Place de la Concorde.

name: Hotel Eiffel Blomet
adress: 78 rue Blomet, 75015 Paris France
description: Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Paris does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hôtel Eiffel Blomet, a nice option for travelers like you. Rooms at Hôtel Eiffel Blomet provide a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can stay connected with free wifi. In addition, while staying at Hôtel Eiffel Blomet guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. You can also enjoy a pool and breakfast. While staying at Hôtel Eiffel Blomet, visitors can check out The Catacombs of Paris (1.5 mi) and Champs-Elysees (2.0 mi), some of Paris' top attractions. When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Pizzeria Popolare, César Restaurant, and LouLou Paris Restaurant, which are some Italian restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike. If you’re looking for something to do, Eiffel Tower (1.2 mi), Observatoire Panoramique de la Tour Montparnasse (0.9 mi), and Musée de l’Armée des Invalides (1.1 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Hôtel Eiffel Blomet. Hôtel Eiffel Blomet puts the best of Paris at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Maison Souquet
adress: 10 rue de Bruxelles, 75009 Paris France
description: Only those in the know will experience the luxury of the Maison Souquet, hidden behind an understated facade signaled by two red lanterns. The bawdy, wanton legend of the City of Light was forged in the area around Montmartre, a legend of which the Maison Souquet now forms part. In a building that served as a pleasure house during the Belle Epoque, one of the most lavish and licentious pages in the history of Paris has been brought to life. Jacques Garcia has applied his talent to recreating the mystery, elegance, exoticism, sensuality, and ostentatious luxury of these establishments with their own architectural mores. Carried away from the city on the whimsy of the decor, the mind is free to pursue pleasure amid a fantasy setting conjured through artwork, sofas, causeuses, and divans. Perfectly at home, guests see their room open out onto a plush setting where life revolves around the ritual of tea-time, play, and rendezvous before and after dinner.

name: Hotel Les Matins de Paris & Spa
adress: 3 rue Clauzel, 75009 Paris France
description: The Hotel Atmosphere You're here. Where? In South Pigalle (Sopi for those in the know) at the heart of a relaxed, trendy area. You're someone who likes to discover a lovely, well-decorated place that has experienced the buzz of many lively decades. Because just so you know, in the 50s and 60s our address was the haunt for some of the city's most artistic inhabitants. Right in this building, Paris' first American restaurant, opened by the dreamer Leroy Haynes, attracted a joyful jumble of musicians from Ray Charles to Marianne Faithfull ... Today why not improvise a friendly meeting or get-together here with a cheerful laziness and nonchalance? Plunge into the voluptuous harmony of the spa, get spontaneous advice from an attentive staff that has the time to listen to you. Do you hear our music? The soul of Matins de Paris clearly sets the tempo for your stay here as you find your own reference points in the most inspired of places ... and neighborhoods.

name: Hotel Da Vinci & Spa
adress: 25 Rue des Saints-Peres, 75006 Paris France
description: The journey back to the Renaissance starts in the lift. The glass panel is a window through which you can admire a series of drawings taken from the various studies executed by Leonardo da Vinci. The hotel's 24 rooms are named after the leading figures of the Quattrocento. These include Botticelli, Raffaello, Michelangelo and Catherine de' Medici. The invitingly comfortable rooms are decorated in a style that takes in a great many references, such as a highly typical caqueteuse chair, or a dressing room with curved features, reminiscent of the wardrobes of the period. Almost half the rooms have balconies. Some look out over the hotel patio, a haven of peace and quiet, while others, overlooking the Rue des Saints-Peres, afford a glimpse of the Louvre nearby!

name: Hotel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
adress: 43 rue Monsieur le Prince, 75006 Paris France
description: The Saint-Paul Rive Gauche hotel belongs to a Franco-British family, hoteliers for 4 generations, who have made this boutique-hotel a marriage of French elegance and English comfort. Situated on the line of Paris' former outer wall under Philippe Auguste, this 17th century building was once the home of Franciscan monks. The 31 bedrooms are colorful and range in style from the modern - vibrant flowered fabrics - to the traditional - exposed beams and elegant opaque curtains. There are beamed ceilings, faux ostrich bed-heads, clever corner armoires, even two baldaquin beds beneath the high ceilings of the lower floors. Entirely renovated this boutique-hotel is close to everything, in the heart of the action, but in a quiet little street. The Luxembourg gardens vicinity and the so many walking distance sites like the Sorbonne, Notre-Dame cathedral, the Pantheon, Cluny museum and the Louvre, make the Hotel Saint-Paul Rive Gauche a convenient pied-à-terre for enjoying the city.

name: Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France
adress: 218 rue de Rivoli 01 Arr., 75001 Paris France
description: "An unique view in the heart of Paris" The Hôtel Brighton, built on Rue de Rivoli by Lord Egerton at the beginning of the 19th century, became one of the capital’s leading hotels, attracting many British customers. This district of Paris, which is now the 1st arrondissement, was very popular with British clients on The Grand Tour, an initiatory trip across Europe and sometimes as far as Asia with the aim of completing the artistic and cultural education of the young middle classes. The hotel has preserved a large number of antique elements down the years, beginning with the period mosaic with the words "Hôtel Brighton" on the ground beneath the arcades of Rue de Rivoli in front of the hotel. Inside, the marble columns in the hall, the sculpted high reliefs in the bar, the set of antique mirrors and the many French windows, the tall ceilings on the "noble floors" and the exposed beams in the rooms on the upper storeys all bear witness to the history of the site and the people who gave it its charm. But what makes the Hôtel Brighton a truly exceptional place is the breathtaking 180° panorama. To the left, the Louvre, once a royal palace, today a museum, the Tuileries Gardens opposite and the Place de la Concorde to the right with the Eiffel Tower in the background. One of your best memories of Paris will be this unique view.

name: Hotel Madison
adress: 143 Boulevard St Germain, 75006 Paris France
description: The Madison Hotel, in the Latin Quarter of Saint Germain-des-Pres, is a boutique hotel in a chic, contemporary style. This delightful hotel with its 50 rooms and suites is located on the Left Bank opposite the church of Saint-Germain-des-Pres and a mere stone's throw from the Seine, the Louvre and the Musee d’Orsay, and the Cathedral of Notre Dame de Paris. The hotel rubs shoulders on the Boulevard Saint Germain with the Cafe de Flore and the Cafe de 2 Magots, at the heart of a quarter famed for its cafes, art galleries, museums, antique dealers and designer fashion boutiques. The Madison Hotel is also firmly at the heart of literary Paris... Albert Camus spent some time at the hotel in the spring of 1940, and it was here that he completed his existentialist novel "L'Etranger" (The Outsider). Perhaps his spirit still hovers somewhere...

name: Domaine De Verchant
adress: 1 boulevard Philippe Lamour, 34170 Castelnau-le-Lez, Montpellier France
description: The Domaine de Verchant is a place that disconnects you from the world without making you a foreigner. It is a land unto itself, a place that exists outside time and space, a cosy cocoon like a family home. 26 luxurious apartments, rooms and suites from 30 to 90 m² achieve a subtle blend of old architecture and contemporary design that extends into the hotel's reception, lounges and lounge bar. The restaurant "Verchant" is open throughout the week whether it's for a business lunch or dinner with friends or family. With stunning views of the outdoor pool and grounds, come and discover the skills and creativity of our chef in a warm and intimate atmosphere.The restaurant "La Plage by Verchant", an absolute must for this charming oasis among the vines: an invitation to escape, relax and unwind...You will experience the pleasure of lazing in the sun, with Mediterranean scents wafting by... just 10 minutes from the city center protected from the urban bustle, a unique, exceptional place. The restaurant seating 70, where you can sample cuisine with a southern French flair, at once refined and delicious. La Plage By Verchant is also a bar, a concept combining: champagne, innovative cocktails, DJ, bands, tapas... a whole programme over the summer season. The appealing 11 x 21 m swimming pool overlooking the vineyard and lined with sunbeds and deckchairs is conducive to that luxuriousness found on all the best beaches. The beach... among the vines, an ideal place to rest and relax in a deckchair looking out onto the vineyard with a refreshing cocktail in your hand.Le Spa by Verchant is a cocoon of bliss covering 2,000 sq meters located at the heart of 17 hectares of vineyards, the Domaine de Verchant spa is dedicated to relaxation and wellness and is open Monday to Sunday from 8:30am to 9pm. Le Spa by Verchant is open to hotel guests, members of the private club and also external visitors in the form of a half day discovery experience or Day spa.The Domaine de Verchant is a venue for your events in a verdant setting: seminars, product launches, conventions, gala evenings. For memorable, natural, luxurious, gourmet stays, the Domaine's two large function rooms and two small lounges are available throughout the year.Heated indoor pool, Turkish baths, saunas and eight treatment rooms, two outdoor pools and a tennis court.Our 13-hectare vineyard lets you explore and discover our grape varieties. Bicycles are available for your use.In our shop/tasting cellar you can find out about and taste our range of wines, and buy them as well.

name: Le Tsuba Hotel
adress: 45 rue des Acacias, 75017 Paris France
description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Paris, Le Tsuba Hotel is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its romantic environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Le Tsuba Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Paris. Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel. Le Tsuba Hotel features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a fitness center and breakfast. Nearby landmarks such as Eiffel Tower (1.3 mi) and Palais Garnier - Opéra National de Paris (1.8 mi) make Le Tsuba Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Paris. Travelers looking to enjoy some shrimp can head to L'Avenue, L'Avant Comptoir, or Pedra Alta. Otherwise, you may want to check out a steakhouse such as Le Relais de l'Entrecote, La Poule au Pot, or Sacrée fleur. If you are interested in exploring Paris, check out one of the ancient ruins, such as Archeological Crypt of the Parvis of Notre-Dame, Arenes de Lutece, and Les vestiges des Tuileries. Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Le Tsuba Hotel is sure to make your visit to Paris one worth remembering.

name: Fauchon L'Hotel Paris
adress: 4 boulevard Malesherbes, 75008 Paris France
description: Life is short — and we intend to savor every moment. Maison Fauchon is all about luxurious indulgences. Experiencing, touching, tasting, and seeking pleasure on our own terms. No apologies. No regrets. Welcome to Fauchon L'Hotel. Fauchon L'hôtel Paris is the new epicenter of contemporary Parisian epicure and luxurious hospitality — curators of culture, aestheticians of the arts, and innovators of fine foods and pastries. Our complimentary Gourmet Bar : There is no better way for Fauchon L'hôtel Paris to demonstrate its commitment to luxurious indulgences and pleasures of the palate, than through a very artistic, curated, original, unexpected moment. As attractive as it is functional, this stunning piece of furniture enables incomparable gratification. Within the many doors and drawers, guests can enjoy unique moments of pure decadence as they seek and savor favorite Fauchon delicacies. Think of it as your very own Fauchon store, made-to-order, just for you. Eat whatever you want, whenever you want, with absolutely no apologies and no regrets! And as our special gift to you, Fauchon will offer you complimentary fresh Fauchon creations upon your arrival to suit your taste preferences. We will customize the contents according to your preference: salty, sweet, healthy, or tasting (a combination of all three). The Gourmet Bar includes a “fresh product” cabinet, a preview of other Fauchon specialities all kept at the ideal temperature. The “drinks” cabinet is the perfect spot to hold wine, spirits, champagne, water, juices, and soft drinks. There is a special area for sweet and savory Fauchon snacks – just perfect for an afternoon nibble – as well as an area to enclose the hot water kettle and Nespresso coffee machine for Fauchon tea, coffee, and hot chocolate. Bon appetite!

description: "The Avancher spirit remains in a brand new setting. Built more than 60 years ago, the Avancher Hotel has completely been rebuilt during Summer 2017. Frédéric Monneret and his team have managed to reconcile the warm and friendly atmosphere of this historic cottage with the comfort of a hotel of today. name: Hotel des Saints-Peres - Esprit de France
adress: 65 rue des Saints Peres, 75006 Paris France
description: "A peaceful hotel in the heart of Saint Germain des Prés quarter" The Hôtel des Saints Pères’ facade was built in 1658 in a classic style based on balance and measure, by Daniel Gittard, Louis XIV’s architect. It marks the beginning of the building’s history which became a hotel from the end of World War I. The private hotel offers guests peace and quiet away from the busy street outside with an outdoor patio shaded by trees and overlooked by the elegant rooms above, the most famous of which is decorated with a ceiling fresco from L'Ecole de Versailles. The exceptional work was an allegory which was ordered in 1666 by Pierre Abraham (Louis XIV’s butler), and depicts Intelligence watching the Augur being crowned by Virtue. Each room at the hotel has its own identity, expressed via the paintings and the engravings from the 17th and 18th centuries, when French Art was at its peak. The sculptured front wall, bas-reliefs, open beam ceilings and statues are also some of the elements that give the building such architectural character. It is ideally located in the center of Saint-Germain-des-Prés and artists such as Francis Bacon, the iconic Juliette Greco, pianist Alfred Brendel, writers such as Hervé Bazin and designers such as Tom Ford are just some of the famous people who enjoyed staying here.

name: Hotel Mont-Blanc
adress: 62 allee du Majestic, 74400, Chamonix France
description: Summer and winter alike, Hotel Mont-Blanc is the must address to visit in the valley of Chamonix. This elegant establishment has all the comfort and services for an agreeable stay. But more than that, this historical establishment has the extra charm to make this experience unique, immersed in the heart of a city living to the rhythm of one of the most exceptional mountain sites in the world. The 5 stars hotel was fully renovated by the interior designer Sybille de Margerie, inspired by nature and the environment. The bedrooms face a beautiful panorama of mountains, providing space, luxury and comfort. « At the Matafan, I offer a cuisine that goes back to basics, both delicate and tasty, always with an allusion to local gastronomy. » The chief Mickey Bourdillat does not limit his inspiration to the products from the most beautiful French alpine valley. His cuisine is a journey through the Alps, the Aosta Valley and even the Mediterranean Basin. The hotel Spa is a real haven of relaxation with over 250 sqm of pure wellbeing. It invites you to unwind with Clarins treatments and massages surrounded by earth colours and wood that create a warm and inviting atmosphere. . You can also enjoy the steam room, the sauna, the experience shower and the cold shower to get your blood circulation going, or just unwind in the beautiful relaxation room with a healthy smoothie or tea. The gym with fitness equipment of latest technology invites sport lovers to warm up for the day and the large (14 m x 10 m) heated outdoor swimming pool and Jacuzzi with an impeccable view on the Mont-Blanc Mountain range, propose an elegant combination of luxury and wellbeing.

name: Un Hotel en Ville
adress: 20 Place du Marechal Foch, 17000, La Rochelle France
description: Situé dans le quartier historique et à 2 minutes à pied du Vieux Port de La Rochelle, Un Hôtel en Ville est une adresse centrale mais également confidentielle au calme, face à une place arborée d’où l’on apprécie l’emblématique Tour de La Lanterne et l’art de vivre rochelais. Entièrement rénové et redécoré en 2020, Un Hôtel en Ville vous accueille dans l’une de ses 11 chambres raffinées. Quelque soit la catégorie des chambres, vous apprécierez la qualité de la literie de la Maison Simmons, le linge raffiné, l’attention particulière apportée aux choix des matériaux nobles. La salle de bain a été entièrement réinventée avec tout le confort contemporain, des serviettes d’exception et des produits d’accueil bio, respectueux de l’environnement. Le service fait la différence et en séjournant à Un Hôtel en Ville, vous ne repartiez pas indifférent de cette escapade en bord d’océan. L’Hôtel a créé deux espaces de vie commune pour profiter des deux instants les plus importants d’une journée, le petit-déjeuner et l’instant repos après une journée de visite dans La Rochelle ou de travail. Le petit-déjeuner est un buffet gourmand vitaminé et élaboré avec soin offrant des produits régionaux. L’après-midi au retour d’une journée bien remplie et avant de se préparer pour sortir diner dans un restaurant de choix, profitez de la terrasse située sur le toit de l’hôtel.

name: La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris
adress: 83 avenue Kleber 16 Arr., 75116 Paris France
description: This prestigious address offers the ideal combination of independence and personalized service in a luxurious setting. Located in Paris' 16th arrondissement, between the Trocadero and the Avenue des Champs-Elysees, the residence comprises two buildings, each with its own unique ambience. They effortlessly combine celebrated architect Ricardo Bofill's modernism with stately Haussmannian style. Enjoy the warm, elegant atmosphere of this exceptional 19th-century building, with its wood paneling, drapes, fine net curtains and exquisite gilding. The tasteful color palette perfectly accents the subtly refined decor. The building designed by Ricardo Bofill offers a more contemporary style, which features rounded contours and natural light. Our 112 spacious rooms and apartments boast generous volumes - a rare luxury in the City of Lights. The Suite Tour Eiffel offers an exceptional view of its namesake monument. You'll enjoy the welcoming atmosphere in the different lounge areas, where plush sofas invite you to put up your feet and relax while taking in the sumptuous surroundings. If you need to relax, take a break in the residence's Turkish bath. The gym and a personal fitness coach are also at your disposal. Live like a Parisian in the French capital's most exclusive neighborhood, just a few steps from museums, theaters, luxury-brand shopping and celebrated restaurants.

name: La Reserve Paris - Hotel and Spa
adress: 42 avenue Gabriel, 75008 Paris France
description: 42 Avenue Gabriel, Your Parisian place of life Mid-way between Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honore and Avenue Montaigne, a stone's throw from the Champs-Elysees, where the heart of Paris beats. Nestled in a peaceful location, slightly set back from the world's most beautiful avenue, La Reserve Paris - Hotel and Spa overlooks the Grand Palais, the Eiffel Tower, the Pantheon and the Concorde obelisk. Just in front, a majestic curtain of trees preserves the intimacy of this place, like an echo of the Elysee gardens nearby. Michel Reybier's highly distinctive urban mansion has all the elegance of a 19th century private apartment, where ultra-personalized services can be enjoyed in complete simplicity and discretion. All around are immense spaces bathed in light, barely muted by the rich fabrics of the hangings. Scattered here and there are beautiful marble fireplaces, and everywhere the joy of vast indoor spaces, typical of Haussmann-style apartments. The noble and generous materials exude a forgotten spirit of generosity. More suites than rooms, a library reserved for guests and their friends, a smoking lounge, a 16-meter indoor pool (a rarity in Paris), wine cellars in the suites, an inner courtyard with lush greenery echoing the landscaped entrance. At La Reserve Paris - Hotel and Spa, you experience the quintessence of Parisian chic in the Belle Epoque.

adress: 25 Allee des Acacias, 22240 Sables-d'Or-les-Pins France
description: Located in Sable-d'Or-les-Pins, opposite the lagoon, the Hotel & Spa La Voile d'Or-La Lagune combines the magic of a preserved natural site with a careful welcome, dedicated to well- where every detail counts. A haven of calm and freedom, ideal to rech the rhythm of the tides, you will observe the Herons and Egrets spyglass before relaxing on the terrace at the outdoor spa which combines sauna, salt water nordic bath, and jacuzzi. At La Voile d'or-La Lagune, comfort and quality express themselves with elegance. The raw wooden decoration echoes the nature and purity of the place. The high quality bedding guarantees your rest. Guests can enjoy a variety of on-site or nearby activities such as golf, horseback riding and cycling. Electric bicycles, paddle board, long board and kayak can also be rented on request. Each room has an 80 cm flat-screen TV and a nespresso machine with assortment of hot drinks (coffee, tea, infusion). Some also have a seating area. The en suite bathrooms come with a bath or shower, a towel dryer, a hairdryer and hospitality products.

name: Arok Hotel
adress: 7 Place de la Gare, 67000, Strasbourg France
description: Plus qu’un hôtel… une vision, une âme, un lieu de vie. A l’image de Miss Arok. Une femme inspirée et inspirante, en mouvement, qui saisit l’air du temps, lui donne du sens et incarne une certaine idée de la modernité. Son esprit souffle en beauté sur le nouvel Arok Hotel, en plein cœur de Strasbourg. Design et chaleureux, idéal pour se rassembler lors d’un séjour d’affaires ou touristique, l’Arok se distingue par un cadre apaisant, confortable et contemporain. Implanté face à la gare TGV, il épouse les codes de la nouvelle génération d’hôtels chics et urbains, sans rien sacrifier aux services et à la convivialité. Bienvenue dans l’univers imaginé par Miss Arok !

name: Hotel & Spa La Belle Juliette
adress: 92 rue du Cherche Midi, 75006 Paris France
description: La Belle Juliette. The discreet luxury of a four-star hotel and the charm of an address that visitors and Parisians will give to their most demanding, cultured friends. In the pure Parisian tradition of Saint-Germain-des-Pres, the hotel is guided by a modern vision of romanticism and urban conviviality. Exceptional service with particular attention to hospitality, guests' well-being, calm and tranquility... All in the heart of bustling Saint Germain. Corinne and Pascal Moncelli, the owners of the hotel, have decided to breathe new life into an establishment that had been left to abandon on the rue du Cherche-Midi by telling the story - or rather stories - of a famous historical personality. This star of her time lived in the 19th century, frequented all the intellectuals and politicians of the era, was blessed with exceptional beauty, had an extraordinary love life and - above all - excelled in the art of receiving. The popular literary salon that she organised from the tender age of 15 attracted the greatest minds of the time and continued until her death, age 72! It is Juliette Recamier - famously known as La Belle Juliette - who gives her name to this new hotel.

name: Hotel Grand Powers
adress: 52 rue Francois 1er, 75008 Paris France
description: Among the Parisian buildings which hold the most extraordinary stories, there are hotel windows behind which are the loveliest dreams. Nobly established right in the heart of Paris’s Golden Triangle, the Grand Powers Hotel has shared in an adventure with connoisseurs of beauty and travellers from around the globe since 1920. After welcoming guests for almost 100 years, the hotel is being rejuvenated, a total transformation from the inside out. The haussmannien architecture, typical of the quartier is revisited with new decor inspired by the best elements in design: Italien sensuality, Parisian chic and old English cosiness, with the intention to provide new experiences for its guests who have come to revel in its elegance.

name: Chateau de Pondres
adress: 2 allee du Pigeonnier, 30250 Villevieille France
description: Historic monument of the XIIth century, entirely renovated, authenticity is the heart and soul of the Château de Pondres. For a page in history and tranquility, combined with the modern comforts of an upscale hotel. The Château de Pondres is ideally located halfway between Nîmes and Montpellier, 45 minutes from Avignon, Arles and Baux-de-Provence and 30 minutes from the beach. Situated close to the national parks of the Camargue and the Cévennes, in the heart of the Vineyards of the Gard and the Pic St Loup, next to the medieval town of Sommières. Easily accessible by road (just off the A9 highway) and about 30 minutes from the train station of Nimes and Montpellier. The castle overlooks a 15-hectare park, dating back several centuries, bordered by gardens and a river. Our facilities include many indoor and outdoor recreation areas including , a restaurant, several lounges, a library, large terrasse, chapel, a ceremonial courtyard, several reception rooms, a restaurant and a wellness area. The cozy rooms provide all the modern comfort and standard of a high-end establishment. In this heritage-based castle, attention to detail is our top priority. Whether you are with us for a few hours, a night or several days; relaxation, activities and a timeless moment full of emotion is assured.

name: Citadines Bastille Marais Paris
adress: 37 boulevard Richard Lenoir 11th Arr., 75011 Paris France
description: Close to Place des Vosges, the most beautiful square in Paris, Apart'hotel Citadines Bastille Marais Paris plunges you into the very heart of the French capital. The charm of the Marais district is evident in the presence of sumptuous 17th century mansions and its well-preserved character and heritage. But it is undoubtedly in its unassuming alleyways that the district's magic works best, thanks to the art, photography and antiques galleries. Old Paris offers an endless stream of curiosities just waiting to be discovered. Your Apart Hotel overlooks the Boulevard Richard Lenoir and its beautiful tree-lined promenade. It is located 10 minutes from Place de la Bastille, and just a few steps away from the Bréguet-Sabin metro station. You will find it the ideal pied-à-terre for a few nights or a stay of several weeks in Paris. If you are travelling by car, our serviced apartments hotel offers you access to a private car park (charges apply). Paris's 11th district is sure to surprise you. The Bastille district is one of the liveliest and trendiest in the capital. By day, lose yourself in its winding alleyways as you wander from little shops to hidden courtyards. In the evening, make the most of the area's buzzing party atmosphere. Just steps from the hotel, you can explore the Marais, Paris's lively historic centre. From Beaubourg to Place des Vosges, not forgetting the Musée Carnavalet, magnificent private mansions rub shoulders with gardens, art galleries and trendy bars. Whether you are on a business trip or travelling with family, the fully serviced apartments of Citadines Bastille Marais Paris feature fitted kitchens and satellite TV to blend modernity and comfort. Our studios and apartments can accommodate from two to four people. And for even greater luxury and space, some even have a terrace or balcony. Reception is open 24/7 to ensure that your stay is as pleasant as possible and complementary WiFi is available in all our serviced apartments.

name: Hotel d'Orsay - Esprit de France
adress: 93 rue de Lille, 75007 Paris France
description: "The quietude of a Parisian mansion with a strategic emplacement" The Hotel d’Orsay is in the middle of a triangle linking the Seine to the Assemblee Nationale and the Musee d’Orsay. The hotel’s beautiful, simple facade has four niches containing elegant statues that reflect Paris’ history both artistically and politically. Napoleon I’s surgeon lived here before the building became a hotel attracting travelers from around the world, close to the railway station that opened for the 1900 Universal Exhibition. Then the station became a museum, but the hotel is still welcoming visitors from all over the world, together with the many politicians, senators and elected representatives who frequent the Saint-Germain-des-Pres quarter. In the hotel, you will find a lovely vegetated patio, a spacious lobby lovely furnished, warmly decorated rooms with antique art collection which also makes room for pieces of contemporary art. Together, they offer refinement, comfort, and serenity. Within the Hotel d’Orsay, some paintings, most of them are portraits, were made by artists exhibited at the Orsay Museum. Located in the quiet heart of Paris, close to the Seine and its riverbanks, from the magnificent Tuileries garden, the Louvre Museum, the Hotel d’Orsay opens his doors towards the Art, gardens and business.

The hotel was constructed in 1856 to welcome the painters, sculptors and writers who would go on to put the Latin quarter at the very heart of European culture. This cultural heritage is present even in the bedrooms. Tastefully decorated, they generate a feeling of calm and a sensual ambiance. description: Elegance and serenity At the heart of the Pink Granite Coast and facing the Seven Islands Archipelago, L'Agapa is first and foremost a place where everything is done to give priority to the magic of the view: vegetal decoration, fine sandy beach, nature reserve and a protected site for northern gannets. A former hotel of the 1930s, L'Agapa and its two satellite villas, La Désirade and L'Eden Roc, unite modernity with prestige, elegance, harmony and balance. The architecture of the hotel is inspired by the wealth of the Breton environment - a mixture of sea spray and pink granite - but also of more modern materials like glass and steel. Art Deco and contemporary styling are interwoven with elegance in a discreet, understated decor, supplemented by advanced new technology. The priorities of L'Agapa lie in the quality of the service and reception of its guests, ensuring the comfort and well-being of all with a real emphasis on the human aspect.

You will feel at home at this boutique hotel – a delightful, secluded mansion, offering a warm welcome. Enjoy our reception rooms with their exposed beams, settle down into our plump armchairs and enjoy a book from the library or relax in one of our enchantingly elegant guestrooms. All our rooms, whether Classic or Superior and including our Junior Suite, are meticulously appointed – just relax and let yourself be cosseted. The hotel is located in the heart of Saint-Germain-des-Prés, right next to the secret world of Rue du Bac.

name: Hotel France Albion
adress: 11 rue Notre Dame de Lorette 75009 Paris, 75009 Paris France
description: The France Albion Hotel is superbly located for a Parisian visit. Metro line 12 crosses Paris from north to south, with the business areas of Paris - Porte de Versailles, Gare Saint Lazare, La Defense - on one side, and on the other side is Tourist Paris: Opera, Madeleine, Concorde, Musee d'Orsay, Jardins du Louvre, Champs Elysees… Sports enthusiasts are not forgotten: The Stade de France is 20 minutes with the RER B or D from North Station. The Parc des Princes is 40 minutes with line 9 (direct). In an ideal position less than 20 minutes from the main Paris stations: Gare du Nord by bus n° 43, line 7 for the Gare de l'Est, line 12 for Montparnasse and line 14 to the Madeleine for Gare de Lyon. The Paris airports are within easy reach: The Roissy bus from Opera or the RER from Gare du Nord will take you to Roissy / Charles de Gaulle, whilst for Orly, take the Air France Cars shuttle from Montparnasse on line 12, or the RER from Gare de Nord. We can also provide private airport shuttle transfer in either direction on request.

name: Hotel Arena
adress: 1 avenue Jean Gonord, 31500, Toulouse France
description: Everything appeared ok on arrival. Good sized room, comfortable bed & nice modern shower room. As before this is a way from the city which meant quite a walk in 29 degree heat. Having asked for directions we were indebted to Mrs D's command of Google Maps or we'd never have made it. Left,left then straight on. Really?? On our return we tried to operate the air-con with no success. A trip to reception revealed the hotel turn the air-con off when it is considered unnecessary. 29 degrees?? I think the customer should decide when it's needed. Not much sleep to be had. Cheap rates? Cheapskates.

description: Situated in the heart of Chamonix, near the town's main thoroughfare and its shops, Hôtel de l'Arve enjoys a unique location in the Mont Blanc Valley. This charming three-star hotel has 37 rooms, a wellness area and a flower garden with a view of Mont Blanc. Although located in the centre of Chamonix, Hôtel de l'Arve offers a comfortable and quiet family atmosphere all year round with all the comforts to make your stay a memorable one. Its friendly staff is attentive to every detail and provide a range of personalized services. Complimentary tea time is served for guests every afternoon by the fire in the winter and along the banks of the Arve river in the summer. Hôtel de l'Arve also features six new apartments built using ecological materials and tech- nologies. Ranging in size from 53 to 100 m² (570 to 1,076 sq ft) and combining the comforts of home with all the services of a hotel, they are perfect for holidays with friends and family.

name: Hotel Diderot
adress: 4 rue de Buffon, 37500, Chinon France
description: Ideally situated in the heart of old Chinon, nestled in the quiet and historic neighborhood of the Saint Mexme collegiate church, Hotel Diderot welcomes you into a 15th century limestone mansion, restructured in the 17th and 19th centuries. Hotel Diderot is famous for its marvelous breakfasts, offering a dizzying selection of homemade jams, delicious French breads, brioche and croissants, locally produced fresh goat cheese, honey and fruit juice. Close to the fireplace in autumn, or on the shaded terrace as soon as the warm weather arrives, the first meal of the day must be as unforgettable as the night that preceded it. Gluten-free breakfast available on request. Here you will find peace and tranquility ; you will experience the warm hospitality of a " tourangelle " residence, in the land of Renaissance writer Francois Rabelais, amidst the splendid vineyards of the Val de Loire, the landscape dotted with magnificent castles and unique gardens.

name: Le Manoir Des Impressionnistes
adress: 23 route de Trouville Phare du Butin, 14600, Honfleur France
description: The XVIIIth century Norman manor is tucked into a wooded hillside overlooking the Seine estuary, just outside the old port of Honfleur. The manor proposes eleven charming bedrooms, each individually decorated. You will enjoy gastronomic cooking using local produce in our restaurant or on our terrace, experiencing magnificient sunsets. The open fire in the bar provides a warm and cosy atmosphere from which to enjoy a cup of tea. You will appreciate the tranquility and the intimacy of our Spa situated in the old farm of the Manor. The Spa is open to our hotel guests as well as our external guests in our wellness area which propose a sauna, steam room, Spa de nage and a terrace overlooking the sea.

name: La Cour des Consuls Hotel&Spa Toulouse-MGallery
adress: 46 rue des Couteliers, 31000, Toulouse France
description: At the heart of old Toulouse, in a charming 18th-century family residence, the rooms and suites at this 5-star hotel create an intimate, restful setting. Thomas Vonderscher adds his signature touch to the Le Cénacle restaurant. A selection of champagne-based cocktails are available in the Club bar, where unexpected pleasures await in the executive lounge and library. Elegant meeting areas, a spa and fitness room all complete this haven of luxury and well-being. Come and marvel at the staircases, heritage balustrade, fireplace, lush inner courtyards and exquisite materials. Chantal Peyrat's design boldly combines classic and contemporary in an exclusive, enigmatic setting.

name: Le Pigalle
adress: 9 rue Frochot, 75009 Paris France
description: Mythical and imposing, languid and frenetic, Pigalle is a neon light in the Parisian night. The neighbourhood has always attracted bad boys and artists, musicians and adventurers. With neither a monument nor a meeting point, it lacked a spot that really reflected its tawdry values, brazen spirit and musical energy. And so, Le Pigalle was born. An authentic neighbourhood hotel, whose history was shaped by the cultural mix that swirls on the southern slopes of Montmartre. The team is local and will take you to meet some of the places, people and stories that bring Pigalle alive and make Paris so vibrant. The croissants are provided by the nearby bakery, the books selected by the local bookstore and the music chosen by a neighbourhood DJ who also is an album collector and happens to be born in Pigalle. Local artists, shopkeepers and restaurant owners, they all have something to say about their neighbourhood. You can meet up for a drink, a night (out), or a coffee. This is Pigalle!

name: Hotel The Originals Grand Hotel de Courtoisville
adress: 69 boulevard Hebert, 35400, Saint-Malo France
description: See why so many travelers make Grand Hotel de Courtoisville their hotel of choice when visiting Saint-Malo. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.While staying at Grand Hotel de Courtoisville, visitors can check out La Grand' Porte (1.3 mi) and Les Remparts de Saint-Malo (1.3 mi), some of Saint-Malo's top attractions.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Grand Hotel de Courtoisville offer a flat screen TV.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a concierge and room service. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Crêperie Le Tournesol, Le Millésime, and Bergamote, which are some French restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.Looking to explore? name: Hotel Princesse Caroline
adress: 1 B rue Troyon, 75017 Paris France
description: At the heart of the Golden Triangle, near the Champs-Elysées in the 17th district of Paris, Princess Caroline hotel offers you a warm welcome. Our 3-star hotel took its name from Napoleon's sister, Caroline Bonaparte, wife of Joachim Murat. From this imperial history, our hotel has retained a certain idea of the French art of living combined with an elegant and refined atmosphere. As a romantic hotel in the heart of Paris, the Princess Caroline provides the promise of an exceptional stay. Our hotel offers 53 air-conditioned rooms both cosy, quiet and very comfortable. Most of them offer views on the rue Troyon. Rooms on the 7th and last floor look out on the rooftops. The Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysées are just a few stemps away...

name: Hotel Splendide Royal Paris
adress: 18 rue du Cirque, 75008 Paris France
description: Faithful to the values ​​of art de vivre of the Roberto Naldi Collection, the Hotel Splendide Royal Paris is a discreet location, refined, nestled in the heart of one of the most elite streets of Paris, calm and elegant. Inside the Splendide Royal, the beauty of warm materials and refinement of the most contemporary comfort combines with subtlety. The atmosphere is that of a place of luxury, distinguished, tasteful and without ostentation: here one feels at ease. The classic-style decorations redesigned with subtle Italian touches give each junior suite and suite a unique and personalized charm. With a capacity of 12 junior suites and suites located in pairs on six floors, the objective of the Roberto Naldi Collection is to create "A Parisian house" chic and relaxed in an Italian spirit, a kind of "pocket-sized family Palace." An elegant Italian restaurant will open its doors in early 2017. It will propose a simple cuisine, refined and extremely qualitative under the leadership of the starred chef, Michelino Gioia, who officiates at Pauline Borghese restaurant at the Parco dei Principi Grand Hotel & Spa in Rome, one of the establishments of the Roberto Naldi Collection.

name: Hotel George - Astotel
adress: 46, rue Notre Dame de Lorette 9th Arr., 75009 Paris France
description: Located in a beautiful, century-old building in the 9th district of Paris, the George Hotel is the perfect place for your stays in downtown Paris. Completely renovated last year in a decidedly Parisian style, it perfectly combines modernity and practicality. With its quiet and colorful atmosphere and its location near two metro stations, our hotel is recommended for both business travelers and holidaymakers. Upon arrival, you will be greeted by our warm and caring team , at your disposal 24 x 24. Our 46 rooms are decorated with modern furnishings, provide excellent soundproofing, comfortable beds, satellite TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower. The hotel is entirely air-conditioned and offers free Wi-Fi. A rich and varied breakfast buffet is served every morning including hot drinks, pastries, juices, cereals, eggs, etc. The hotel is ideally located between Montmartre (Moulin-Rouge / Sacred Heart) and Opera, just steps away from a Metro station with direct connection to the Champs Elysees. Find endless shopping options right around the corner with Galeries Lafayette, Printemps Haussmann, etc. The airport shuttle A/R is available for a fee and upon reservation. The trip takes about 30 minutes. There is also a convenient car park nearby. The George Opera Hotel is 140 meters from the Saint George Metro station (line 12) and 400 meters from the Pigalle (lines 2 and 12) metro station.

description: The Hotelo hotel is ideally situated (close to Perrache and Ampère metro stations) in the very heart of Lyon, a designated UNESCO World Heritage site. The hotel is only a stone's throw from Perrache train station, with both Place Carnot and Place Bellecour on the doorstep. The districts of Gerland and La Confluence are easily accessible, as are the Jean Moulin, Lyon 2 and Catholic Universities. The Hotelo hotel is an ideal base for you to visit the town and surrounding areas, from Vieux Lyon to the more modern quarter of La Confluence. Plus it's easy to get around without your car with the metro, bus, tramway and Vélo'V bicycle hire all within easy reach. A perfect way to visit our beautiful city of Lyon! The hotel is entirely non-smoking. All rooms are en-suite with either a shower or a bath and are equipped with flat-screen TV, telephone and free Wifi access. Our friendly team is on hand to personally welcome you to the Hotelo Hotel.

name: Hotel de Crillon, A Rosewood Hotel
adress: 10 Place de la Concorde 8th Arrondissement, 75008 Paris France
description: Fronted by the majestic architecture of Ange-Jacques Gabriel, Hôtel de Crillon, A Rosewood Hotel overlooks the spectacular Place de la Concorde, one of the most beautiful city squares in the world. Built at Louis XV’s request, the hotel became the residence of the illustrious Count de Crillon and his family for many years and was transformed into a hotel in 1909 under the guidance of architect Walter-André Destailleur. Since then, its guest list has featured celebrities, politicians, artists, princes and queens, all attracted to the hotel’s unique and perennial reputation for excellence. Hôtel de Crillon has long since secured its iconic status as a one-of-a-kind property, a living testament to the very best way of life France has to offer. Following a four-year transformation, the Palace hotel opened in 2017 and now boasts 124 guestrooms and suites, four restaurants, a spa, a swimming pool, three heritage landmark salons for meetings and functions, and more.

adress: 30-32 Rue du Sentier, 75002 Paris France
description: The Hoxton, Paris is a grand 18th century residence in Paris’ 2nd arrondissement with original staircases, plentiful Parisian flair, and camera-baiting corners aplenty. It has 172 bedrooms with seriously comfy beds, chevron timber floors, bold feature walls and oodles of local Parisian charm. adress: 15 rue Gaston Boissier, 30900 Nimes France
description: Unacceptable, we went to the bar of the hotel to get some drinks because we knew the cocktails were very well done and delicious.   They made a mistake with our orders. Once they made the right cocktails (2 were the same) they came in different glasses, for a 17€ cocktail we expect the glasses to be the SAME.   The waiters paid absolutely no attention to us whatsoever, they never came to ask if we wanted more, or if the cocktail was good.   The final and most terrible mistake was that they did NOT even know the name of their cocktails, we told them that there was a mistake on the bill (they were the ones losing money, not us) and they laughed at our faces, treated terribly and made fun of us, they entire bar staff teamed up against us and started correcting us.   Ridiculous, embarrassing, unprofessional and DISAPPOINTING.   THIS IS NOT A FIVE STAR HOTEL…

name: Chateau Les Oliviers De Salettes
adress: 1205 route du Chateau, 26450 Charols France
description: After three years of renovations and meticulous attention to detail, owners Robin and Dominique now run Château Les Oliviers de Salettes as a charming Hotel-Restaurant and Spa. The building that exists today, a three-storey castle with a turret at each end, was part of a much larger chateau, the centre of a vast vineyard. Now it lords it over five hectares of finely landscaped parkland, with dining terraces, boules pitch, infinity pool, and panoramas that reach to the first mountains of the Alps. Honeymooners, families, the lazy and the lively: all will love it here. In addition to on site facilities, there is a.o. tree climbing, paragliding, canoeing, riding and golf nearby. A nice spa is available on site. Uncluttered bedrooms are full of lofty splendour and furnished in classic French style, their stone walls and great beams intact; bathrooms (three in the dovecote) are state of the art. Dinner is a highlight of the stay on the panoramic terrace.

name: Hotel Louvre Lens - Esprit de France
adress: 168 rue Paul Bert parking situé rue Jean de la Bruyère, 62300, Lens France
description: "The renaissance of an industrial past" A former authenthic mining cottage, the Hotel Restaurant Louvre Lens’ structure is an integral part of the surrounding mining region. With Maes Artchitectes Urbans who worked hand-in-hand with interior designer Guillaume Da Silva, Esprit de France has turned the old miners’ houses into a 4-star hotel. In order to keep the authentic settings and the building’s sense of place, the pattern of the façade made of bricks, has been kept intact. The addition of large sliding glass doors and windows to enjoy the garden, makes the hotel authentic. The hotel is shaping the future history of a quite unusual destination which has become a must-see since the Louvre-Lens Museum opened, located just opposite the hotel. The Galibot brasserie, an extension of the bar, contributes in making the hotel a real living place. Associated to the comfort of the rooms, the hotel Louvre-Lens offers the pleasure of having furnished common areas where guests can read, play pool or baby-foot. There is a gym and a sauna for relaxation and wellbeing. In addition, the hotel offers adjustable meeting rooms to host seminars, banquets, and events. The town of Lens also offers high-end event hosting facilities.

description: Located in a park of 3000 m², this hotel features a heated outdoor pool. It is located 5 km from the city center of Arles, near the regional park of the Alpilles. name: Hotel Le Pigonnet
adress: 5 avenue du Pigonnet, 13090, Aix-en-Provence France
description: "A secret garden in Aix-en-Provence" The Hotel Le Pigonnet is an enchanting escape in the heart of Aix-en-Provence. This elegant Provence bastide combines the 18th century warmth with a contemporary style in order to offer guests a pure delight of charm and peacefulness, where the heaven’s doors are always opened. And imagine admiring the majestic Sainte-Victoire Mountain as through the eyes of the renowned painter Paul Cézanne. The beautiful garden remains a real place to live where regular guests, guests on holidays or people from the city, play the traditional “pétanque”, enjoy the swimming pool or savor southern cuisine dishes, at the restaurant La Table du Pigonnet. Take a stroll around this marvelous garden. The magic and peaceful atmosphere makes you believe you are not in the heart of the city. This haven of peace is lined up with century chestnut trees, a blooming arcade with roses of a thousand colors. Le Pigonnet currently brings Aix locals and tourists from around the globe together via fine dining and music. Traditions and modern art de vivre are rolled into one, making the hotel an ideal base for touring the south. It is also a destination in itself. Relax to the sound of the water features and walk in Paul Cézanne's footsteps. No need to go far to escape as you explore the delightful sections one after another.

description: Standing in front of the Mediterranean sea, facing the Bay of Cannes, the Pullman Cannes Mandelieu Royal Casino combines relaxation with sophistication. The hotel has 213 modern rooms with clean lines with a private terrace and stunning views of the sea, the countryside golf courses. Just 15 min from the Croisette and the Palais des Festivals and 25 min from the International Nice Côte d’Azur airport. The hotel Pullman Cannes Mandelieu, located next to the Bay of Cannes, benefits from a beachfront location. This modern hotel provides entertainment and comfort to any seasoned traveller with 213 rooms. Terraces are also available with some overlooking the Lerins Islands and the Mediterranean Sea. For business travels, the Pullman hotel offers up to 1500 sqm of modular space for events or conventions. Amenities include a restaurant, bars, casino, nightclub, pool, fitlounge, private beach, direct access to the sandy beach and tennis court.

name: Relais & Chateaux - Hostellerie de Levernois
adress: Rue du Golf, 21200 Levernois France
description: The Hostellerie de Levernois is above all a bucolic setting in a protected area just 5 minutes away from the A6 highway. This lovely bourgeois house, in complete harmony with nature, is composed of 26 bright rooms (4 of them apartments) distributed in 3 different buildings, in a park of more than 5 hectares. The Hostellerie benefits of an ideal geographic position in the heart of Burgundy, rich in history and culture. It is surrounded by prestigious vineyards such as Gevrey Chambertin, Vosne Romanee, Pommard, Meursault or Puligny-Montrachet. Come discover the pure Burgundian tradition. Enjoy a meal in our Bistro along the river or taste our Michelin starred cuisine. Learn about wines in the tasting cellar and let our sommelier guide you through an exceptional selection of wines.

name: Hotel Le Menestrel
adress: 27 avenue du General de Gaulle Route des vins, 68150 Ribeauville France
description: Enjoy the peace and the proximity of the nature, being immersed in Ribeauville's famous vineyard, staying in one of the 29 modern and spacious rooms of the Hotel le Menestrel, some of them having a balcony. All the rooms are accessible using the lift and we have rooms specifically designed for persons with reduced mobility. The Hotel le Menestrel has a very large private car park, which is secure. You will be able to enjoy our comfortable terrasse or our bar, sitting immediately in front of the vineyard. There you will choose between a large variety of Alsatian wines. And don't forget to spend time in the wellness center (sauna et jacuzzi), available free of charge for our customers. We are at your disposal to help you to enjoy your trip and discover the best places of our superb area, by car, cycling or hiking. Directly from the Hotel le Menestrel you will find well-signposted cycle tracks and several walk tours. The Hotel le Menestrel is the ideal starting point of a lot of hikes and trips that will allow you to discover the cultural heritage of our beautiful area and also of its gastronomy, its wine cellars and distilleries.

name: Hotel Villa Lara
adress: 6 Place du Quebec, 14400, Bayeux France
description: The Villa Lara is a small privately-owned luxury boutique hotel with a chic but casual atmosphere in the historic center of Bayeux. Next to it, the Villa Augustine is set in the peaceful grounds and part of the Villa Lara and has 4 presidential suites of 220 square meters with a newly constructed interior within its original charming 19th century exterior. Both villas are adjacent and nestled in the historic center of Bayeux, in a very quiet square facing the 11th century majestic cathedral and along the Aure River. The famous Bayeux Tapestry is only 2 minutes away, the pickup point for all D-Day excursions are literally outside our door. Our 32 rooms are appointed in an elegant French style. All the rooms are accessible by lift and equipped with air conditioning, a minibar, large flat-screen TV and safe. The marbled bathrooms have a walk-in shower and a separate bathtub in most of the rooms. The 28 rooms of the Villa Lara range from 30 to 50 square meters while our presidential suites are 220 square meters, all with a view on the Bayeux Cathedral. Beds are minimum 1.80 x 2 meters and in most of the rooms can be up to 2 x 2 meters. Wireless high-speed internet access is free throughout the hotel, which features a cozy bar/lounge area with a fireplace and a library, a marbled lobby, and a breakfast room set in a traditional French style where the breakfast is prepared and served in front of the guest, from 7am till 10:30am. Our complimentary fitness center is available 24/7 and equipment includes a treadmill, bicycle, weights and strength training machines. A private carpark is available with 15 spots based on a first come first served basis, and a drop-off space for buses. Although we meet the official government criteria of a 5-star property, we do not have a restaurant, spa, nor a formal bellman at the front door. We do not want to mislead our future guests who attribute these specific amenities to their image of a 5-star property, although we do of course provide porterage and turn down. And, as always, our commitment to 5-star service is at the forefront of our day-to-day operations.

name: Hotel du Rond-Point des Champs-Elysees - Esprit de France
adress: 10 rue de Ponthieu, 75008 Paris France
description: "A unique Art Deco setting" “Go through the entrance to the early 20th century with its elegant Art Deco canopy overhead and take up residence close to the main sights of Paris.” The Hotel du Rond-Point des Champs-Élysées has belonged to the family of Mrs Villette-Vuitton since the late 19th century. Esprit de France’s recent refurbishments pay tribute to all the original 1920 features, from the Art Deco canopy and marble elements outside to the wine bottle glassware and the tin radiator covers within. The hotel name, “Le Rond Point” (roundabout) evokes an abundancy of styles and genres inciting difference and travel. Refurbishing encompassed carefully selecting each decor to create a poetic, bohemian-chic universe with a hint of nostalgia, as well hunting down antiques to pair with the modern furniture to create a visual and timeless contrast. The result is a delightful feeling of peacefulness, as if time had stopped. The basement now houses a 13-metre pool, which offers the luxury to swim in an art deco setting. The breakfast room and the bar will transport you between a cozy alcove and a multiplied mirrors’ game.

name: Chilly Powder
adress: 2740 route des Ardoisieres Les Prodains, 74110, Morzine France
description: Chilly Powder is a hotel but with the personal touches of a chalet. We have been operating ski chalet holidays of excellence since 1995. The genuine ski to the door location of our 3 luxury catered chalets with unrivalled in-house childcare facilities sets us apart from other ski chalets in Morzine.The pistes from Morzine Avoriaz descend straight into the garden and the main cable car opposite the chalet takes you to the heart of the Morzine Avoriaz skiing with the best access to the vast Portes du Soleil ski area. There are well over a hundred catered chalets in Morzine but only a handful can boast ski to the door locations. With all en-suite bedrooms, outdoor Jacuzzi, sauna, massage and in-house childcare in our crèche, the chalet is absolutely unique in Morzine for small or large groups or families with children or babies. The truly excellent cuisine, friendly staff and relaxing atmosphere of the chalet make it the perfect holiday destination and for our many returning guests it is considered a real home from home.

name: Hotel Davia
adress: Col de Fogata, 20220 Ile Rousse, Corsica France
description: In front of the sea, the Davia hotel is located at the heart of the "Balagne" (north part of the island). Overlooking the white sand beaches of "Ghjunchitu" and "Bodri", it is situated close to the wildest creeks from the historic district of "la Marina de Davia", municipality of Corbara. When you enter the groomed environment of the Davia hotel, you will be struck and literally, under the spell, of the Mediterranean style interior and exterior decoration as well as its gardens. name: Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France
adress: 4 Rue d'Alger 1st Arr., 75001 Paris France
description: "A refine treasure in a former 19th century private residence" Two steps away from the Rue Saint-Honoré where is located the fashion district, this private residence built in the 19th century and belonged to the House of Noailles has often been used by figures of the fashion world such as photographer Patrick Demarchelier, top-model Twiggy and Madame Grès’ models. The interior designer, Cybèle Paluel-Marmont, designed decorations tailored to each room using fabrics and finery comparable to those used by the leading fashion houses by elevating the modern style with flashes of original fittings. Each room boasts an original work of Art. The stylish and warm colors and fabrics (wool, velvet, tweed) add the finishing touch and the carefully selected notes make each room at La Tamise unique. Mathilde Jonquière steered a similar course in her design and production of the bathroom mosaics. Designed as a privileged and almost private place where you feel at home, La Tamise is a haven you'll love coming back to every time you're in Paris and which makes the trip a stylish and moving experience.

The rooms offer air conditioning and a minibar, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease. Hotel Castelbrac features a concierge and room service. In addition, as a valued Hotel Castelbrac guest, you can enjoy a pool and a lounge that are available on-site. Close to some of Dinard's most popular landmarks, such as Notre Dame d'Emeraude de Dinard (0.5 mi) and Barrage de la Rance (1.5 mi), Hotel Castelbrac is a great destination for tourists. While in Dinard, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Hotel Castelbrac, including Le Cafe Rouge (0.3 mi), La Cour de Récré (0.2 mi), and Le Citrus (0.3 mi). Best of all, Hotel Castelbrac makes it easy to experience many great Dinard attractions like Promenade du Clair de Lune (0.2 mi), Villa les Roches Brunes (0.5 mi), and Pointe du Moulinet (0.3 mi), which are a short distance away. Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Hotel Castelbrac is sure to make your visit to Dinard one worth remembering.

name: Hotel Le Bon Cap
adress: 10 rue Montangue, 22240 Plurien France
description: Hotel Le Bon Cap is located in the village of Plurien between Cap Frehel and Erquy, near the beautiful beach of Sables d'Or les Pins. This former 'Hotel des voyageurs' dating from the 2nd quarter of the 20th century built in pink sandstone was fully restored and meets the new standards of safety and accessibility. Le Bon Cap puts at your disposal 11 rooms with exceptional comfort: range bedding, bathroom, private WC, TV and free WI - FI access. The hotel has free private parking and a suitable room with access for people with reduced mobility. A stay at the hotel Le Bon Cap will allow you to discover this beautiful region of Bretagne: small charm fishing harbours (Erquy, Dahouet, Le Guildo) , beaches of Sables d'or Les Pins, Val Andre, Frehel, Saint Cast le Guildo and all along the coast to Saint Malo, but also treasures of architecture (Fort la Latte, Chateau de Bienassis, Dinan...) This privileged location will delight lovers of water sports, foot and boat fishing, hiking and Equestrian as well as golf.

description: Located in a quiet alley of the trendy 9th arrondissement of Paris, hotel Adèle & Jules is a newly opened hotel, with a very chic Parisian style. It offers all services you would expect such as free high speed wi-fi, 24 hr reception with full concierge service, as well as an Honesty Bar, room service, a business corner, a fitness and a meeting room for up to 18 guests. Hotel Adèle & Jules offers 4 categories of rooms: The Superior Parisienne, the Deluxe Faubourg, the Club Boulevard, as well as 2 Suites Capitale. All rooms come with 1 double bed (Queen size 160 or King size 180) or twin beds (2x80 or 2x90). They are all equipped with 40' flat screen TV with satellite channels, Air conditioning, individual safe which can accommodate a laptop, bathrooms with Shower or Bath, Fragonnard amenities, bathrobes, hair-dryer. In our Deluxe, Club and Suite categories, guest can enjoy a Nespresso machine as well as tea facilities. Upon arrival guests can relax and refresh with complimentary mineral water. The hotel offers a complimentary High tea every day from 4 to 6 PM in the lounge area. Continental buffet Breakfast is served from 7h to 11h30, or it can also be ordered in room. Thanks to its exclusive location in a private alley and with the addition of sound proof walls, guests can enjoy total silence in all rooms categories, although the neighbourhood raves with restaurant, cafés and bars as well as theatres. The hotel front desk team will be happy to take care of all your needs: restaurant bookings, cultural activities, shopping tips, bicycle rental, transportation including transfer to and from the main airports. Luggage service is free and available at all times.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Divona Cahors
adress: 113 avenue Andre Breton, 46000, Cahors France
description: Once you have entered our lobby, overlooking the front garden and bathed in the Southern light, you leave behind the busy town centre to fully enjoy the exceptional view over the river Lot and the Valentré bridge, that the Best Western Plus Hôtel Divona Cahors offers from all its areas. Each of our 36 guestrooms and 2 junior suites have a private balcony and a large bay window, offering a privileged view over the river, Valentré bridge –illuminated at night- and hills on the opposite bank. The generous size of the rooms (from 21 to 40 m²) allow you to enjoy a long stay in Cahors. They have either queen-size (160cm), king-size (180 cm) or twin beds, separate toilet, tea and coffee making facility with Nespresso® machine, minibar and safe deposit box. From the terrace of the bar and breakfast room overhanging the Lot, you will enjoy our breakfast buffet during the summer season, or will appreciate the coolness of the river on hot summer evenings while sipping a cocktail. All the year round, the cocktail bar offers a cosy ambiance for an afternoon or evening drink, or to enjoy our ice-creams and home-made cakes and scones. Your stay at the Best Western Plus Hôtel Divona Cahors will also give you the opportunity to laze under the sun on the terrace of the wellness centre facing the bridge, before cooling down in our indoor swimming pool, equipped with countercurrent swimming jet and hydromassage shower. The sauna and body treatment service will enable you all the year round to relax after a long day of leisure of professional activities. The fitness room, equipped with bike, rowing machine, treadmill and multigym will help you give a dynamic start or end to your day. Our meeting facilities covering 120 m² can seat up to 100 guests in 3 modular rooms, all facing the river. They offer a peaceful and spacious environment for professional or private events. Located on the inner bank of the meander of the river Lot that surrounds Cahors, the Best Western Plus Hôtel Divona Cahors is 8 to 10 minutes walk from the cathedral, the medieval historic town centre, its hidding treasures and shopping streets. A variety of restaurant adapted to all you needs, from the simplest to the most gastronomic are available around the hotel or in the town centre. From the hotel, you may also drive quickly out of town to wander along the Lot valley, through its vineyards, over the hills of the Causse du Quercy regional natural park or to the gems of our region : the villages of Saint-Cirq-Lapopie (25 km) and Rocamadour (70 km, further North), the caves and prehistoric paintings of Pech-Merle (30 km), Padirac sinkhole, Cénevières 13th century castle (40 km), Figeac (70 km)… among many others.

name: Hotel Parc St. Severin - Esprit de France
adress: 22 rue de la Parcheminerie 5th Arr., 75005 Paris France
description: "A hotel in the center of the Quartier Latin, one of Paris-lovers’ favorite parts of Paris" Located in the center of the Quartier Latin, the Hotel Parc Saint Séverin overlook a peaceful pedestrian road amid the busy, intertwining lanes that date back to the Middle Ages. The Rue de la Parcheminerie takes its name from parchment merchants who worked here in the 14th century, when the trade was a prosperous one. The schools and students of the Latin Quarter came here to buy their parchment, making this a very busy street. Later Diderot’s first home in Paris in this street. Just a few minutes’ walk away, you can stroll past the booksellers on the quays of the Seine, discover Sorbonne University and the Saint-Michel Fountain and then the majestic Notre Dame Cathedral on the other bank. Picturesque Île Saint Louis and timeless Jardin du Luxembourg are also nearby, from the hotel. But beyond the historic situation of the site, it is the view over the rooftops of Paris, Notre Dame Cathedral, the church and cloister of Saint Séverin, the Panthéon and even the Eiffel Tower that give the Parc Saint Séverin Hotel its inimitable charm, at the heart of the 5th arrondissement, the romantic heart of Paris.

name: Hotel Sezz Saint-Tropez
adress: 151 route des Salins, 83990, Saint-Tropez France
description: The Sezz Saint-Tropez, 5* boutique hotel, subtly combines charm and design exalting the special feeling of being elsewhere. The canvas for the 37 luxurious rooms is 2 acres of lush grounds centered by the oasis of the 25 meter pool shaded by olive and palm trees. All rooms feature 5 meter floor to ceiling French windows delivering an unmatched sense of space and light. The contemporary design experience by Christophe Pillet is amplified through the use of the highest quality materials including Boffi sinks, Porro furniture, Mazzega lighting and Acqua di Parma products. From the Gulf of Saint-Tropez to the infinite pinewood forests, the Kube Saint-Tropez offers amazing views. Overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, the Kube Saint-Tropez's modern architecture and perfect location less than 5 minutes away from the city has it all. The cuisine, exquisite. name: Hotel Parc St. Severin - Esprit de France
adress: 22 rue de la Parcheminerie 5th Arr., 75005 Paris France
description: "A hotel in the center of the Quartier Latin, one of Paris-lovers’ favorite parts of Paris" Located in the center of the Quartier Latin, the Hotel Parc Saint Séverin overlook a peaceful pedestrian road amid the busy, intertwining lanes that date back to the Middle Ages. The Rue de la Parcheminerie takes its name from parchment merchants who worked here in the 14th century, when the trade was a prosperous one. The schools and students of the Latin Quarter came here to buy their parchment, making this a very busy street. Later Diderot’s first home in Paris in this street. Just a few minutes’ walk away, you can stroll past the booksellers on the quays of the Seine, discover Sorbonne University and the Saint-Michel Fountain and then the majestic Notre Dame Cathedral on the other bank. Picturesque Île Saint Louis and timeless Jardin du Luxembourg are also nearby, from the hotel. But beyond the historic situation of the site, it is the view over the rooftops of Paris, Notre Dame Cathedral, the church and cloister of Saint Séverin, the Panthéon and even the Eiffel Tower that give the Parc Saint Séverin Hotel its inimitable charm, at the heart of the 5th arrondissement, the romantic heart of Paris.

Our 38 charming and intimate rooms are equipped with flat screen TV, internet connection, i-Pod station and safe. We attach great importance to your comfort: Our hotel is non-smoking and also offers environmentally-safe welcome products. Both children and grown-ups will love our breakfast time: Children can move about in their own playground while a tasty and varied buffet is served. You can also relax in our luminous lobby with a luminous bay window, browse the web on your computer with our free WiFi , or read the style magazines available. The Palm Opera Hotel is 350 meters away from the Cadet Metro station, which provides direct access the Opera , Galeries Lafayette , Louvre Museum and the district of Chatelet . The Palm Hotel, standing in the heart of Paris by the Opera, is a colorful oasis for those seeking an original stay.

Beautiful Renaissance facades, fat round towers surrounding the main building, a water-filled moat, a formal garden - after just that first glance you will want to stay the night, for a weekend, or for even longer ! Francois I had the right idea - the Chateau de Nieuil was one of his favourite hunting residences. Majestic trees, green lawns and a peaceful lake all add to the calm and peacefulness of the place. Would you like to come in? Please do!

name: Chateau de la Messardiere
adress: 2 route de Tahiti, 83990, Saint-Tropez France
description: Château de la Messardière offers magnificent panoramic views over the Bay of Saint-Tropez, vineyards of Ramatuelle and beaches of Pampelonne. Located just 3 minutes from the sea and Saint-Tropez town centre, this authentic 19th-century castle, bordered by 25-acre grounds, is an exceptional vacation choice. The refined 465 m² Valmont and Cinq Mondes Spa is combined with a fitness center with pool, jacuzzi, steam baths, and high-tech exercise and cardiotraining machines. All 57 suites and 60 rooms have balconies or private gardens. The hotel's gourmet ‘L’Acacia’ restaurant specializes in refined and generous Southern-style cuisine. name: Hotel Napoleon
adress: 40 avenue de Friedland, 75008 Paris France
description: Behind the history of the hotel, hides a love story....The love story between a rich Russian businessman, Alexander Pavlovich Kliaguine, and a young french student who first met at a "literature salon" in 1928. It was love at first sight. In order to introduce her to Parisian "high society" at the time, he bought a hotel in the prestigious 8th arrondissement and gave it to her as a wedding present. Still today the hotel belongs to the Kliaguine family.Today, following a large renovation program, the hotel is proud to announce its 5th star.With its unique location, just a short walk away from the Champs-Elysees and the Arc de Triomphe,   the Hotel Napoleon is one of the most legendary hotels of the city: a fine address to discover and rediscover. Our 52 rooms and 50 Suites are all designed in the Empire style with newly refurbished and modernized colors. A Parisian atmosphere still remains in the Hotel.The Napoleon includes also a Bar- Restaurant: the Bivouac Cafe, 8 meeting spaces and a fitness room.

In a warm and relaxing setting you will find 25 rooms (comfort or family) with a view on the flower-decorated streets of Oberhaslach and the Vosges. All our rooms are equipped with flat screen television, a direct telephone line, and a free wifi access. We also have a large car park with CCTV in front of the hotel. Our restaurant proposes you a traditional menu with its Alsatian specialities. A pleasant dining room with its exposed beams will be the ideal setting for your family meals or your business meals. During the week, we propose you the day's menu for a quick lunch. For your family outings we organize a brunch every Sunday and on bank holidays. You will also be able to enjoy our summer terrace. Taste a pastry by our fireplace in the afternoon and finish the evening with a digestive drink in the lounge.

name: Hotel Regina Louvre
adress: 2 Place des Pyramides, 75001 Paris France
description: The prestigious Regina Hotel, recently renovated, belongs to a long French tradition of luxury hotels. In the heart of the trendy district which is home to fashion design, shopping and museum, Paris aficionados will find the ideal place to stay, across the Louvre museum and the Tuileries Garden. Thanks to its wonderful situation, the capital's major attractions are just a stone's throw away including the Palais Royal and the Champs Elysees. From here, the luxurious Place Vendome, Orsay museum and the shopping centre Les Halles can be reached within 15 minutes on foot. Furthermore, the 'Tuileries' and 'Pyramides' metro stop at 150 meters provide quick and easy access throughout the city. First opened in 1900 for the World's Fair, Hotel Regina welcomes you in an intimate, spacious, sophisticated haven, where fine woodwork and designer lighting reinforce its anchor in Paris' history. This fully air conditioned property offers an array of services including a 24h reception, concierge, room service, laundry and limousine service amongst other. Furthermore, complimentary wireless Internet is accessible throughout the property. Each of the 99 rooms at the Regina Hotel in Paris has been elegantly furnished with antiques and period furniture, creating a traditional and luminous decor. Modern in-room amenities include a safe, direct dial telephone and flat screen television with satellite channels. Some of the bedrooms offer breath-taking views of the Louvre museum, the Tuileries Garden and the Eiffel Tower. Let yourself be charmed by its pretty Patio (opened on sunny days) and its staff dedicated to your personal needs. In its British atmosphere of the hotel bar, you will enjoy a drink or a cocktail from our Chef Barman. You will have also the opportunity to relish pastries from our pastry chef and our selection of teas. For lunch and dinner the Hotel Regina Restaurant will propose you a French and seasonal cuisine.

name: La Signoria
adress: Route de la foret de Bonifato, 20260, Calvi, Corsica France
description: "At the gates of Calvi" the old Genoese estate of Paratella once granted by King Louis XV of Mr Murat Serpriere, now houses its guests in 27 rooms, Suites and Villas customized. Isolated in this charming 18th century, the rooms open onto the Bonifato Valley and offer a panoramic view of the mountains bordering the coast. A 3 km from the sea and 4 km from the city center of Calvi, in a park of 3 hectares of Mediterranean accents - Eucalyptus, palm, olive and pine trees reminiscent of the beautiful place of eternity - here everything is quiet, calm and voluptuousness . One area in nature, ten minutes from Calvi, through forests and hills. Corsica and especially a visceral and authentic that appears in the layout, decor and atmosphere created by the owner Jean-Baptiste Ceccaldi. A house to live to learn more about the Corsican soul, nice rooms, which open on the mountains, indigenous materials, wood, terracotta, of great refinement in sobriety, large suites with pool and private garden and a service tailored to the wishes of the residents. New Spa 100% organic cosmetic line associated with a bio-Corsican. Meeting space for this year. The hotel "La Signoria" also called "A casa Ceccaldi," is undoubtedly one of the finest luxury hotels in Corsica. The former estate of Paratella is the source of this lovely building. Built under the influence of the Genoese island, the estate was then granted Mr Murat the Serpriere by Louis XV. Today, this wonderful home exceptional charm, surrounded by a beautiful park, well deserves its fame. Fascinating in its beauty, we could stay for hours to watch. Stroll through this garden of 3 hectares, while savoring the smell of the maquis and orange trees, singing fountains, will be a real fun time! It is in this extraordinary setting that welcomes guests to the Signoria. The Signoria has 27 Rooms and Suites customized, single-storey opening onto the gardens and terraces, with magnificent views of the mountains and the valley Bonifato. All offer luxury and amenities of a 5 star hotel. Here, the union of different styles from several periods, with an exotic note, is a success and elegance is still present. The Signoria also has 5 luxury villas, all stone, with private pool and garden
