name: Le Clos Parc & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
adress: 98 rue de la Ferte Vidame, 27130 Verneuil-sur-Avre, Verneuil d'Avre et d'Iton France
description: Le Clos, the story start in 1770 when the nuns of the Abbey of Saint-Nicolas bought the land under the old regime called "The garden of the Beguine". Bordered by the remains of city walls and a tower called the white tower, the plots became peasant gardens. A century later, in 1886 - under the protection of a gentleman benefactor of the Abbey of Saint-Nicolas - a Castle was born. The Benedictine nuns began hosting families opened a school for girls of the abbey. The round tower and the square pavilion, pepper-pot roofs and four slopes, false battlements and tall chimneys, windows and doors decorated with braces, are a harmonious example of architectural style of Viollet-Le-Duc. The mansion was an inspiration for the architect to draw on the exceptional tower houses that have adorned the town of Verneuil since the fifteenth century. In gothic style, the walls come alive with color. The "checkerboard", so characteristic of the region, combines the dark brick called "flamed" orange brick and whitewashed plaster, while flints and brick diamonds offer subtle variations in the tone. The sisters welcome families into the 1960s. In 1961, it was renamed the Hostellerie du Clos. In 2007 it became Le Clos. The castle original will require ongoing renovations, modernization and decoration but will preserve its original spirit. In the spring of 2015 will rise to a former conservatory Gustave Eiffel style of 100 sqm, facing south with a view overlooking the park. It will host the breakfasts, a restaurant that showcases the "Bistronomie" tea room, reading and rest ... A relaxation area with a swimming pool cover, bio sauna, bio steam room, fitness , energy showers ... Finally a south-facing terrace on the ground floor equipped with sun and a beautiful place "nose in the grass" to eat more lightly. Today, the castle of fifteen rooms and suites located in a park of ancient trees has beautiful botanicals, beautiful and loyal birds, four hives with bees pollinate flowers and tree gardens. He is a member of Relais & Châteaux since 1975 and this year celebrates its fortieth anniversary of belonging to this great association

name: La Bastide de Gordes
adress: 61 rue de la Combe, 84220, Gordes France
description: Set atop a rocky outcrop at the heart of the Luberon in Provence, the village of Gordes, one of the "Most beautiful Villages in France" offers exceptional views over the Luberon mountain range. And at the center of that village, La Bastide de Gordes offers all the splendor of a former stately home. Carved into the very rock face of the hill, and built on 12th-century ramparts, the chateau is integrated into fortifications of the village. Combining charm, elegance, comfort and luxury, the hotel features intimate, welcoming and restful interiors. The fine art of receiving guests is evident throughout the rooms and suites, three of which boast private terraces. Handsomely appointed in a refined yet relaxed style, with appealingly rustic touches, they provide unparalleled and memorable views over the fabled Luberon Valley and mountains. The spacious rooms and suites feature private bathrooms with a bathtub, and sometimes also have a separate shower. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided. Provencal cuisine made with local and seasonal products and regional wines are featured in the restaurants:'l'Orangerie" for lunch on week days and brunch on weekends and "La Citadelle" for diner each day. Meals can be enjoyed in the vaulted dining room or on the shaded terrace with its view of the valley. A further restaurant, Peir I Pierre Gagnaire TT, features French gastronomic meals prepared by multi-stared chef Pierre Gagnaire and his team. The 800m SISLEY Paris Spa offers massages, a hot tub, a steem room, massaging jets, an indoor chromatic bath a fitness room and a solarium. The 3 outdoor pools are surrounded by a sun deck and offer unrestricted views of the valley. The hotel was fully renovated at the beginning of 2015 and offers free WiFi throughout.

Now transformed into a charming and intimate hotel, La Maison d’Uzès has regained all its splendour. Led by Ariel Balmassière, architect at Monuments Historiques and Marie-José Tavares, interior designer, the building works have uncovered ancient features which have added to the historical charm. description: Located on Rue Cognacq Jay in the 7e arrondissement, just a few minutes away from the capital's celebrated tourist sites, the Juliana Paris Hotel allows its guests fast and easy access to the city's main cultural sites and tourist attractions: the Eiffel Tower, the Champ-de-Mars, the Quai Branly museum, the Arc de Triomphe, the Invalides, the Grand Palais and also the famous Avenue Montaigne, with its prestigious luxury boutiques and designer shops. The decor of the Juliana Paris Hotel has been meticulously designed. In the bar, the breakfast room, the communal areas, everywhere one looks, beautiful decorative items from all four corners of the world catch the eye. The magnificent chandelier, extravagant mirrors, ethnic statues, art brut sculptures, pictures and paintings, tribal objects, designer furniture, oriental touches, a mother-of-pearl and chrome side table; unique items that give the hotel its own individual character and its refined atmosphere, where Art Deco blends superbly with the contemporary. This warm yet modern ambiance also extends to the 40 rooms and suites and to the health club reserved exclusively for the use of our guests. Steeped in history, the Juliana Hotel gives you the opportunity to order and customise your services online, to make your stay even more comfortable and truly unforgettable. Welcome to the Juliana Hotel, Paris!

name: Maison Nabis by HappyCulture
adress: 7 rue de Parme, 75009 Paris France
description: The Maison Nabis was designed for a total experience ; a pocket palace which is both artistic and nocturnal, intimate and unusual. A small living room, a patio and thirty rooms only, spread over six floors, and declined in six dominant colors: deep green, bordeaux, blue ink, absinthe, black or beige. Everywhere the visitor follow a guiding thread: the Belle Epoque’ audacity and chic style. This coquettish house has the clear curves and the free spirit of the Art Nouveau movement : a small chat room - a bright patio with a stain glass window - graphic rooms with origami vegetal pattern - marble bathrooms and retro taps. Nestled in the heart of the city of light, the Maison Nabis is two steps away from the emblematic and festive Pigalle.

name: Hotel des 3 Poussins
adress: 15 rue Clauzel, 75009 Paris France
description: A delightful gem nestled in the historic Saint-Georges neighborhood, the fully-renovated Hotel des 3 Poussins welcomes you in a unique setting between Montmartre and Opera. On a quiet street near the Sacre-Coeur, Opera Garnier, Gare du Nord, and the department store district, our hotel is located just 100 meters from the Saint-Georges metro station, placing you within minutes of the city's world-renowned sights. Whether you are in Paris for entertainment, sightseeing, business, or shopping, you will appreciate the closeness of the major sights and landmarks of Paris as well as the "village" atmosphere of this friendly, eclectic neighborhood where theaters, cabarets, quaint bistros and tantalizing restaurants are fourishing. Just a few steps from the hotel, you can stroll along the lively Rue des Martyrs and its bustling traditional local shops. In an artsy, atmospheric setting where the creative spirit of Montmartre still feels alive, you will discover our 40 rooms decorated with charm and originality. Comfortably furnished in warm, soothing colors, our rooms create a playful setting where whimsical artwork illustrates the Parisian life of baby chicks (or poussins, our hotel's namesake). Take a break from your busy day to enjoy a cup of tea on our tree-filled patio, or sink into a deep leather armchair in our library-lounge where you will feel right at home. At any moment during your stay, every member of our staff is ready to help you enjoy your time in the City of Light.

description: Chateau de l'Epinay is a wonderful small and luxury hotel in the Loire valley. Our hotel, as our guests say, is a "home away from home". You can relax and enjoy a treatment at our Spa Cinq Mondes which will be the delight of your stay, but also sunbath close to our natural pool and outdoor jacuzzi. Coming for a romantic stay, business trip or family time, you can visit the chateaux and beautiful gardens of the Loire Valley, but also play using our free access activities : hammam, tennis court, pétanque, ping pong. Oh, and we almost forgot, there is also a fitness room with Technogym machines, and you can canoe from island to island in our 3km lake. If it is rainy, no worries, you can watch a movie or play snooker in our game room, or read close to the fireplace. Our restaurant L'Orangerie offers an Italian delicious menu. We look forward to welcome you !

name: Hotel Juliana Paris
adress: 10 rue Cognacq Jay, 75007 Paris France
description: Located on Rue Cognacq Jay in the 7e arrondissement, just a few minutes away from the capital's celebrated tourist sites, the Juliana Paris Hotel allows its guests fast and easy access to the city's main cultural sites and tourist attractions: the Eiffel Tower, the Champ-de-Mars, the Quai Branly museum, the Arc de Triomphe, the Invalides, the Grand Palais and also the famous Avenue Montaigne, with its prestigious luxury boutiques and designer shops. The decor of the Juliana Paris Hotel has been meticulously designed. In the bar, the breakfast room, the communal areas, everywhere one looks, beautiful decorative items from all four corners of the world catch the eye. The magnificent chandelier, extravagant mirrors, ethnic statues, art brut sculptures, pictures and paintings, tribal objects, designer furniture, oriental touches, a mother-of-pearl and chrome side table; unique items that give the hotel its own individual character and its refined atmosphere, where Art Deco blends superbly with the contemporary. This warm yet modern ambiance also extends to the 40 rooms and suites and to the health club reserved exclusively for the use of our guests. Steeped in history, the Juliana Hotel gives you the opportunity to order and customise your services online, to make your stay even more comfortable and truly unforgettable. Welcome to the Juliana Hotel, Paris!

description: Since 1859 the majestic, white facade has contemplated Saint-Malo bay. The first hotel built in what was to become THE sea-side resort on the Emerald Coast was initially named the Hotel de Dinard, before becoming the Grand Hotel Barriere de Dinard. Renovated by expert decorator Alexandre Danan, the hotel offers the utmost elegance, modernity and finery. Situated 45 min. Away from Mont Saint Michel, Dinard the "elegant" is all yours: the sea air and spray, the palm trees, the sea gulls, the beaches, the golf clubs by the sea, the Casino, Port Breton tennis courts, midnight strolls, Dinard market and the hotel's heated pool, wellbeing at the Spa Diane Barrière, Sauna and steamroom, lazing on the terrace and in the gardens facing the bay, summer jazz brunches, cocktails at "333 cafe", dinners at the George V, facing the sea, buffet breakfasts watching the sun comes up: could this sum up the good life combined with discrete luxury?

name: Maison Nabis by HappyCulture
adress: 7 rue de Parme, 75009 Paris France
description: The Maison Nabis was designed for a total experience ; a pocket palace which is both artistic and nocturnal, intimate and unusual. A small living room, a patio and thirty rooms only, spread over six floors, and declined in six dominant colors: deep green, bordeaux, blue ink, absinthe, black or beige. Everywhere the visitor follow a guiding thread: the Belle Epoque’ audacity and chic style. This coquettish house has the clear curves and the free spirit of the Art Nouveau movement : a small chat room - a bright patio with a stain glass window - graphic rooms with origami vegetal pattern - marble bathrooms and retro taps. Nestled in the heart of the city of light, the Maison Nabis is two steps away from the emblematic and festive Pigalle.

name: Hotel des 3 Poussins
adress: 15 rue Clauzel, 75009 Paris France
description: A delightful gem nestled in the historic Saint-Georges neighborhood, the fully-renovated Hotel des 3 Poussins welcomes you in a unique setting between Montmartre and Opera. On a quiet street near the Sacre-Coeur, Opera Garnier, Gare du Nord, and the department store district, our hotel is located just 100 meters from the Saint-Georges metro station, placing you within minutes of the city's world-renowned sights. Whether you are in Paris for entertainment, sightseeing, business, or shopping, you will appreciate the closeness of the major sights and landmarks of Paris as well as the "village" atmosphere of this friendly, eclectic neighborhood where theaters, cabarets, quaint bistros and tantalizing restaurants are fourishing. Just a few steps from the hotel, you can stroll along the lively Rue des Martyrs and its bustling traditional local shops. In an artsy, atmospheric setting where the creative spirit of Montmartre still feels alive, you will discover our 40 rooms decorated with charm and originality. Comfortably furnished in warm, soothing colors, our rooms create a playful setting where whimsical artwork illustrates the Parisian life of baby chicks (or poussins, our hotel's namesake). Take a break from your busy day to enjoy a cup of tea on our tree-filled patio, or sink into a deep leather armchair in our library-lounge where you will feel right at home. At any moment during your stay, every member of our staff is ready to help you enjoy your time in the City of Light.

Our 3-star hotel is located at the foot of the ramparts of the medieval town of Riquewihr, a short walk from the vines and the vintage wine which gave it its name. name: Holiday Inn Paris Montmartre
adress: 23 rue Damremont 18 Arr., 75018 Paris France
description: Holiday Inn Garden Court Montmartre Hotel in Paris is conveniently located in the highly desirable yet quiet district of Montmartre. The hotel is within walking distance of the famous Basilica Sacre Coeur, which provides amazing views of Paris thanks to its hilltop location. And why not spend your evenings in the famous cabaret Le Moulin Rouge. Located almost on the hotel s doorstep, this provides a valuable insight into the lives of the famous painters who used to live in Montmartre (Picasso, Utrillo, Salvador Dali) This charming hotel and its multilingual staff provide warm and friendly personal service. You are sure to spend an exceptionally quiet and restful night in our large, comfortable rooms. In the morning, enjoy a generous breakfast buffet in the presence of a beautiful fresco depicting the famous stairs of Montmartre. Then, sit back and drink a final coffee on the attractive terrace The Holiday Inn Garden Court Montmartre Hotel in Paris is also conveniently located if you are travelling on business. It is within easy reach of most of the major companies, which are situated in Saint-Ouen, Clichy, Saint-Denis and La Defense, as well as the Convention and Exhibition Center Paris-Nord Villepinte. It also provides direct Metro access to Paris-Expo Porte de Versailles Come and enjoy a wonderful stay with us. We look forward to meeting you as a guest.

name: Holiday Village Pont Royal en Provence
adress: Route de Charleval, 13370, Aix-en-Provence France
description: We decided to take a short vacation at Pont Royal with our two young children.  At the reception the host was unable to communicate in English so it was difficult to get information about the accommodations and to ask questions.   We were surprised that we were further charged 10€ a day for parking, this is outrageous at the price we were paying and should be included in the rate.  We also took the semi-inclusive meal plan and after reading about the different restaurants on the site wanted to try them out, only to find out that we could only use the meal plan at one restaurant.  Lastly at the beginning of September, while the weather is still great, half of the pools and water attractions are closed.    Lastly on the cleanliness and safety of villa we rented.  There were open wires and broken floor tiles on the stairs.  Not a safe environment at all for young children.  It also wouldn't hurt for them to dust once in a while.…

Well-known for its romantic environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Hotel Dune makes it easy to enjoy the best of Saint-Tropez.Guest rooms offer a minibar and air conditioning, and Le Mas Provencal Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a concierge. name: Villa La Coste Hotel & SPA
adress: 2750 route de la Cride Château La Coste, 13610 Le Puy-Sainte-Reparade, Aix-en-Provence France
description: A mi-chemin entre la ville historique d’Aix-en-Provence et le célèbre Parc Naturel du Lubéron, le Domaine de Château La Coste est un endroit intimiste et unique. Niché au cœur d’un vignoble de 200 hectares cultivés entièrement en agriculture biologique, le site vous offre une destination dédiée au vin, à l’art, à l’architecture et au bien-être, dans un cadre naturel préservé. Au cœur de nos vignes, à flanc de coteaux, Villa La Coste est un hôtel à l’architecture atypique soulignée par l’utilisation de matériaux naturels de la région. Sur deux niveaux bordés par une ruelle ombragée toute en pierre de taille et de calades typiques de notre Provence, les 28 Villa Suites, dont dix avec piscine privée, vous offrent une terrasse privative avec une vue panoramique exceptionnelle sur le Luberon. L’architecture contemporaine de l’hôtel est accentuée par l’utilisation de matériaux locaux et épouse le cadre naturel. Une sélection d’espaces de restauration intérieurs et extérieurs, de vastes jardins autour de la piscine, le bar, la bibliothèque, la galerie du lobby et le spa, incite les esthètes à la détente et à la douceur de vivre.

name: Chateau Clement
adress: Chemin de la Chataigneraie, 07600 Vals-les-Bains France
description: Sometimes you stay somewhere that it is impossible to fault and Chateau Clement is one of those places.  Firstly, I would like to thank our host (and the hotel's owner) Marie-Antoinette who could not have been more friendly and helpful.  She and her staff made our stay fantastic and very memorable.  Now onto the accommodation: the interior of this  family-run chateau is  simply breath-taking, with beautiful, ornately carved wooden staircases and wood panelling. We stayed there for three nights, two nights in the 'modern' part of the chateau on the ground floor and one night in a two bedroom suite on the first floor.  The modern suite, still part of the chateau itself,  is large and has been beautifully renovated. (see photos). There is a big bathroom with a jacuzzi bath and  spacious separate shower room.  Tea and coffee making facilities are also provided and there is also a fridge.  The room  leads straight out into the grounds of the hotel which is ideal if you have a dog/children.  For the third night, we had our son and his girlfriend joining us so we moved up into the two bedroomed suite on the first floor.  These rooms are in the stunning, and more traditional part of the chateau (see photos) but also very homely and comfortable, in fact, it's impossible not to feel part of the family when you stay there.  Breakfast, which was included in the price, was very good too with a generous selection of fresh French pastries, traditional cheeses, ham and local bread, as well as cereals and yoghurts.  It is worth mentioning that the hotel is not always able to provide dinner, however, the town which is a five/ten minute stroll away through the grounds has some very good restaurants indeed.  Can't wait to return!…

The bedrooms are luxiously and tastefully decorated all with en-suite bathrooms. Breakfasts are served either in our dinning room or our on stunning South facing terrace.

description: Offering ski in, ski out access, Hotel L’Ours Blanc boasts an ideal situation at an altitude of 2,000 meters on the slopes of the Three Valleys. A chalet style restaurant and terrace with panoramic views. You may work out in the fitness room or relax in the spa with hot tub, steam bath and sauna. Enjoy a before or after diner drink in the spacious lounge with open fire or in the wood decked bar with chimney and mezzanine overlooking the snowcapped summits.Rooms at Hôtel l'Ours Blanc include a balcony, a flat-screen satellite TV and an iPod dock. Bathrobes and slippers are provided. All rooms are accessible by lift, and facilities for disabled guests are available. Free Wi-Fi connections are available throughout the hotel.Skiers will find individual ski lockers and boot-warming facilities.Enjoy creative, authentic and balanced cuisine prepared by Pascal Casali, Maitre Restaurateur, his son Steve and their team, using the finest regional ingredients. Margaret Casali will assure your well being at all times. A la carte specialties and children’s menu.A free shuttle bus service runs from the hotel every 20 minutes to Reberty 1850 and La Croisette. Private outdoor parking is free of charge.

name: Hotel Le Week End
adress: route des Sanguinaires, 20000 Ajaccio, Communaute d'Agglomeration du Pays Ajaccien, Corsica France
description: The Week End Hotel, Restaurant and Beach restaurant Since 1953, the Leca family has been delighted to welcome you every day in their restaurant and since very recently in their new 4* hotel. Situated in an exceptional area in Corsica, along the Mediterranean and sea facing the magnificent Sanguinary Islands, you will be seduced by this beautiful family establishment. Friendliness, relaxation and exceptional landscapes... Overlooking a fine sandy beach, our new 4 star hotel offers you to a true moment of relaxation. A charming and cosy hotel with 10 Suites sea view facing along with its beautiful overflowing swimming pool and heated swim spa. Our recently refurbished Restaurant Le Week End will offer you a delicious homemade cuisine. From tasty meat to local fish. And why not choosing your own lobster from our live lobsters' freshwater aquarium. In a more relaxed atmosphere, the funky Beach Restaurant Le Week End will propose you a selection of grilled fish and grilled meat and tasty salads. The place to be in Ajaccio with the Week End Private Beach. Comfortable long chairs, mattresses, umbrellas with chilled cocktails served by dedicated beach boys. Enter in the exceptional world of...The Week End!

name: Hotel 34B - Astotel
adress: 34 Rue Bergere, 75009 Paris France
description: You'll be amazed by the 100% French interiors at Hotel 34B. This 3-star hotel, ideal for a cultural holiday or shopping trip in Paris, is close to the Galeries Lafayette, Printemps Haussmann and Grand Boulevards. Culture fans will enjoy the hotel's closeness to the Folies Bergères, Opéra Garnier and Musée Grévin. Right next to a metro station on lines 8 and 9, you can travel all over Paris in a flash. A charming 3-star hotel in Paris' 9th arrondissement, with its delicate and detailed design, Hotel 34B stands out from the crowd. The interior decoration and French soul of the hotel ensure a purely Français experience! With its innovative and original design and 3-star service, you will be delighted by Hotel 34B. Stay in one of its 128 rooms, each decorated in an unusual style. Exceptional comfort with high quality, spacious 2-metre beds. Use the free WiFi to organise your days. Enjoy your breakfast with fresh and varied produce in the cosy lobby, then relax on the comfy sofas in the lounge. Travel guides and other books on France are at your disposal, to introduce you to the riches of the country and perhaps help you organise your trips. Soft drinks and snacks are available at the open bar in the afternoon. The attentive staff and warm atmosphere at Hotel 34B will make your stay in Paris truly memorable.

name: Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel
adress: 10, rue Saint Philippe du Roule, 75008 Paris France
description: Located in an exceptional area between the Champs-Elysees and Faubourg St-Honore, discover the charm of a authentic Haussman-style hotel. Surrounded by the portraits of the Bradford family, presented in a universe of soft and warm silks, let yourself be seduced by the refined, bright and delicate interior of Bradford Elysees. All rooms are serviced by a magnificient historical lift. All rooms are air conditioned and decorated in classic, elegant colors. Some of our 50 rooms feature house chimneys, remnants of the Haussmann period, whereas others provide balconies for a true Parisian stay Of course, we do not forget the modern touch: All rooms are well equipped with an iPod docking station, cable TV and a minibar. Delicious, varied, and generous breakfast buffet, served each morning under the sumptuous canopy of the bright dining room. Don't forget that you can also enjoy breakfast in the privacy of your room. Whether travelling with your family or on your own, the charm of our hotel, a safe shelter from the bustle albeit a few steps away from the most beautiful avenue in the world, will no doubt bewitch you.

name: Hotel Pashmina
adress: Place du Slalom, 73440 Val Thorens, Les Belleville France
description: The end of the earth…right next door to home. Hotel Pashmina wises for one thing only : to create a peaceful haven for its guests, a break from daily life and for them to be transported into a new world. For each of the hotel’s five stars we will make five promises to all of our guests : relaxation, excellent family atmosphere, unbeatable luxury, escape and an exceptionally memorable holiday. A luxury refuge This expression may seem contradictory in essence. When we speak of a « refuge », we generally invoke ideas of danger, outdoor mountain living and makeshift accommodation. However, a « refuge » can also be an area where we feel safe, at ease, far from daily troubles…a refuge is a shelter, a cocoon, an oasis in the centre of the desert, or why not a temple on the very top of the mountain, a room with a view out over the horizon ? The experience offered by hotel Pashmina is a simple one : exclusive luxury in a mountain resort.

name: Le Clos du Buis
adress: Rue Victor Hugo, 84480 Bonnieux France
description: Welcome to Le Clos du Buis, your Bonnieux “home away from home.” Le Clos du Buis aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year. For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Bonnieux, Le Clos Du Buis Hotel is located a short distance from Enclos des Bories (1.7 mi) and Le Pont Julien (2.0 mi). Rooms at Le Clos Du Buis Hotel offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a kitchenette providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi. Baggage storage, beach chairs, and outdoor furniture are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A swimming pool and a good hearty breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Le Clos du Buis, free parking is available. While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Mediterranean restaurants, including L'Arome, La Flambee, and Le St Andre, all of which are a short distance from Le Clos du Buis. If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Sous Les Toiles de Provence (0.1 mi) or Gallerie d'Art Rahim Najfar (0.1 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance. Le Clos du Buis puts the best of Bonnieux at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: L'Oustaou du Luberon
adress: La Tuiliere BP 11, Route d'Ansouis, 84530 Villelaure France
description: L’Oustaou du Luberon is the ideal holiday destination for family or friends. Open all year round with 9 gîtes, suitable for 2-9 people. Michel and Cécile delight in welcoming visitors to this lovely oasis of calm, an ideal base from which to explore Provence. Well-being treatments and a number of other leisure activities available. Available on site: pool, tennis court, multi-sports field, mini golf, children’s games, trampoline, mountain bikes for hire, table tennis, table football, outdoor fitness area. F or your well-being and relaxation: large outdoor swim-spa with heated jacuzzi available from 1st April to 31st October. Spa area with steam room and Jacuzzi. Massages available at extra cost.L’Oustaou de Luberon is the ideal destination for your next holidays in Provence. This former agricultural estate, in the South Luberon region, is today a pretty village with 10 holiday gîtes and lovely relaxed feel.Gypsy caravan available to rent for weekends, or longer stays, all year round.

name: Hotel Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel
adress: 123 Boulevard de Sebastopol 2nd Arr., 75002 Paris France
description: Only 10 minutes walking distance from the Pompidou Centre, the Opera and the Marais areas, and facing the Gaite Lyrique Theatre, 123 Sebastopol is the perfect place for an out-of-this-world stay in the heart of Paris.You will be impressed by its top of the range comfort and services and by its unique, movie-inspired design, with each floor dedicated to a French movie celebrity: Jean-Paul Belmondo, Claude Lelouch, Daniele Thompson, Jaoui and Bacri , Elsa Zylberstein or the Italian film music star Ennio Morricone.On entering the lobby, you will enter the movie world and be greeted by our highly professional staff, attentive to your every need and on hand 24h/7.With its easy-to-find location, its direct links to all the major tourist attractions in the capital city, its unique decor and its services tailored to suit every visitor, 123 Sebastopol is THE go-to destination in Paris.

description: Looking for a place to stay in Bonlieu? name: Hotel Le 123 Elysees - Astotel
adress: 123 rue du Faubourg Saint Honore 8th Arr., 75008 Paris France
description: The fanciest address: 123 rue du Faubourg Saint Honore, 8th district. A district renowned for its fashion houses, antique shops, art galleries and gourmet restaurants, a few steps from the Champs Elysees. Our hotel is the new "Haute Couture" of the 8th district. We present an original display of materials: Dressed-stone in some rooms , four-poster beds in others, a starry sky above the zinc roof of some bathrooms... Let us guide you through our grand staircase, decorated with red brick in London style, to one of our 41 rooms of unique and contemporary design. Do not hesitate and stay in the perfect place for lovers of fashion and Parisian lifestyle.
